_sText:
Video Trailer:
==================
Watch in 1080p please! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bjkv3FksY4E&feature=youtu.be

Please Rate This Pack
==================

And comment if you have any suggestions, constructive criticism, or requests. If you request anything, I may or may not get to work on it, depending on how much time it would take/difficulty.
What This Pack Contains:
==================
This map pack contains two small maps, built for short and intense rounds.

Important Things
===================================

_**Please read the following:**_

I give you permission to download these maps and use them on your server/suggest them to other servers without consulting me.

However, I do not give you permission to re-upload, with or without altering, without consulting me first.

cs_OrangeAlley has a 12 player max, **while cs_OrangeMetropolis has a 24 player max.**_

Both of these maps contain Bot Navigation Meshes I worked on, which allow the bots to know where they're going (usually) without jumping off an edge and falling to their death. 
cs_OrangeMetropolis gives a fun game when only knives are used.

_**There are many more maps coming, and this is just a preview. Check out the HD remake of these maps at: http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/178506**_

**Many thanks,
(Lemon) WUNDerDUDe2312**
